content.SCENARIO: Time for a quick knowledge check! Let's see how well you know the difference between the two most important words in sanitation. Get ready!
content.COSMETOLOGY_CONNECTION: Quickly and confidently knowing the difference between cleaning and disinfecting is a mark of a true professional. This quick quiz will sharpen that instinct.
content.THE_LAW: This quiz validates your understanding of the core definitions of 'Clean' (§83.100(2)) and 'Disinfect' (§83.100(3)).
